text:
International pop star Beyonce Knowles looks exquisite in a creation by ace Indian designer duo Abu Jani and Sandeep Khosla in British rock Coldplay’s latest music video ‘Hymn For The Weekend’, which also features Bollywood actor Sonam Kapoor in designer Mayyur Girotra’s outfit.

Abu Jani said: “We are beyond thrilled, pinching ourselves and wondering, is it real? Thirty years into the business and we’re behaving like star-struck kids, gobsmacked by Beyonce and pumped up with excitement. It is a truly wonderful moment for both of us and Team Abu Jani Sandeep Khosla.” Beyonce sports a skin net lotus sequins hand-embroidered dress embellished in gold sequins and crystals lined in red. Also, a floor-length black Exotica Gota coat is worn over the dress. It is hand-embroidered in Gota, beads and multi-coloured resham and applique work.

On Sonam’s ensemble, Girotra said: “Sonam’s sister (Rhea), who is also her stylist, liked this blouse from my range Mayyur Girotras Kutch collection. It was recreated especially for Sonam.” — IANS
title: Beyonce wears Jani – Khosla design
